name: @wowserhq/stormjs
description: StormLib for Javascript, powered by Emscripten

scripts.build: npm run build:stormlib && npm run build:cjs && npm run build:esm
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run lint && npm run clean && npm run build && npm run test
scripts.release:major: npm version major && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch && npm publish && git push --follow-tags

author: Wowser Contributors
